journals.notes:
Arty occurring after going spec/switching team certainly shouldn't disappear. Either the arty shell should be given a "team" (if that makes sense) so we can differentiate between genuine kills and teamkills, or not counted at all.

I also believe arty bar being refilled after team switch is fine. Team refill bars are independent counters.

Actually I don't see any issue here. It would be a more negative game experience for other players when these weapon strikes are interrupted in between. 

Kills & counters are correct. I'll close this.

subject: Artillery and airstrike don't disappear upon going to spectators or changing team
description:
The title is quite self-describing but I'll open up this issue a bit.

How to reproduce:

1. Choose either Axis or Allied field ops
2. Call an artillery/airstrike
3. Change team or go to spectators

This basically brings some sort of problems:

- You are granted any kills you while airstrike is going during your went to spectators or changed team
- When changing team it could be abused to get kills (Call of Duty 4 all over again with grenades!), creating a negative game experience
- And when changing team you get fully refilled chargebar (This should definitely be changed)

-*S
